overview: The video piece “Footnote #02: Hietämäki” seeks to reflect on the object “car”: a golden car is parked somewhere in the dark, the wind is shaking the surrounding bushes. Besides that, not much is happening. The viewers are left entirely to their own projections into the scenery, accompanied by a minimal soundtrack by Carsten Nicolai and Mika Vainio.
title: Footnote #02: Hietamäki,
